body: <!--5d09a71f8925f3f132321140b44b946d-->The last travis run for this pull request was 87 days ago and is thus outdated. To trigger a fresh travis build, this pull request should be closed and re-opened.

diff_hunk:
@@ -106,7 +105,7 @@ AC_DEFUN([AX_BOOST_CHRONO],
 
             fi
             if test "x$ax_lib" = "x"; then
-                AC_MSG_ERROR(Could not find a version of the boost_chrono library!)
+                AC_MSG_ERROR(Could not find a version of the library!)
body: not your fault, but I think the old message is clearer!
